name: Tsuukai!! Slot Shooting
overview: Tsuukai!! Slot Shooting is a 1996 puzzle game by Shoeisha for the Sega Saturn & Playstation One consoles. In the game, blocks fall from above and you have to go around shooting the ones you don't want to fall onto the already prepared board. The game features 4 different layers, but only one is playable at the beginning of the game, and also a 2 players cooperative mode. The gameplay is shoot 3 falling pieces of the same colour to make the detonator appear, when the detonator appear wait until is on the colour of the pieces on the bottom to shoot it and that make them dissappear. A very hard difficulty makes the game a hard challenge for any player. In order to recover the stolen jewels, thrilling slot shooting defeat the enemy by operating the hero Ro-kun. Slot at the top of the screen appearance is set bonus character and shoot three consecutive body the same enemy, adopt a game system of its own that can turn off the enemies of the same color. Let intercept the enemy coming down from above can move freely in the field.
